name: Nade Rewind - Trijam 52
description:
• Recommend to view in full screen mode
  • Audio sound effects from asset pack I had laying around
  • Grenade artwork and animation created from scratch
  • Music is from Artlist a royalty free music subscription I have
  • 6 Levels to complete

Controls (Mouse Only):

Mouse 1 (Hold Left Click):
Power up throw and let go of mouse button to throw

Mouse 2 (Hold Right Click):
Rewind grenade time and let go of mouse button to stop rewinding.

Things I ran out of time for:

  • More levels with additional movable platforms to allow the rewind time mechanic be more relevant
  • Artwork for platforms, floor and background environment

Other Notes:

  • Used Physics within Unity
  • Learning a few new techniques to improve scaleability of game when creating multiple levels
  • Streaming progress is feeling much better
  • Need to stop myself in future projects doing art before game mechanics
